content: would you like your very own handmade replica of your labrador a cute copy of your adorable pup to proudly display in your home here is a simple pattern with written instructions for how to make your very own crochet lab to make your own crochet labrador you will need 100g yellow aran yarn size e / 3 5mm crochet hook 25g black soft & smooth aran yarn 25g purple acrylic yarn for the collar safety eyes stitch marker sharp scissors yarn needle toy stuffing
